Package uk.ac.gla.dcs.bigdata.studentfunctions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleContentToQueryTermCount
    Fetching queryTermCountInArticle short array from the ArticleContent's object.
    ArticlesContentToRankedResultList
    Calculates the average DPH score of each query terms related to a query
    CompleteRankedResultList
    Reduccing the RankedResultList data set into one RankedResultList object.
    NewsArticlePairing
    converts RDD of article content to a Tuple2 where the News article is a class to implement key value pairing for article content.
    NewsArticlePartitioner
    Custom partitioning function for use on strings.Extracts the article and unique article identifier to generate a key using the identifier.
    NewsArticleToArticleContent
    Compile first 5 contents of subtype paragraph and the title of NewsArticle into a string Processes the compiled string using provided document processor Doesn't return a value if title is null
    QueriesToTotalQueryTerms
    Map each query to an executor saves an array of string of query terms for each query
    QueryListUnifier
    Reduces each queries to an instance of QueryToQueryList
    QueryStringCompiler
    Compiles the array of string of query terms into a single array
    queryToQueryLists
    Maps a query to each executor to be reduced to a list
    SumQueryTermCounts
    Reducing the ArticleContentToQueryTermCountArray dataset into one articleContentToQueryTermCountArray short array.
